item.title: 562 Chat Effects
item.dc:creator: @killerjens9 killerjens9
item.description:
@killerjens9 wrote:

go to src/com/rs2hd/packetbuilder/PlayerUpate.java

private static void appendChatTextUpdate(Player p, StaticPacketBuilder updateBlock) { try { updateBlock.addLEShortA(p.getLastChatMessage().getEffects()); updateBlock.addByteA(p.getRights()); byte[] chatStr = new byte[256]; chatStr[0] = (byte) p.getLastChatMessage().getChatText().length(); int offset = 1 + Misc.encryptPlayerChat(chatStr, 0, 1, p.getLastChatMessage().getChatText().length(), p.getLastChatMessage().getChatText().getBytes()); updateBlock.addByteS(offset); updateBlock.addBytes(chatStr, 0, offset); } catch(Exception e) { } }

Credits to Mystic Flow,Gawdz and me

Read full topic
